titleStmt.title: Phinehas's zeal in execution of judgement. Or, A divine remedy for Englands misery. A sermon preached before the Right Honourable House of Lords in the Abby of Westminster, at their late solemne monethly fast, October 30. 1644. By Edmund Staunton D.D. pastour of Kingston upon Thames in the countie of Surrey. A member of the Assembly of Divines.
titleStmt.author: Staunton, Edmund, 1600-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.L. for Christopher Meredith, at the sign of the Crane in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon to the Right Honorable house of Lords, on the monethly fast, October 30. 1644.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Crane in Pauls Church-yard
